roleset.name: include, incorporate
roleset.note: SUBSUME-V NOTES: Could there also be an agent? I'm unsure. (from subsume.01-v)

example.name: passive
example.text: [The schools' central mission, educating children]-1, became subsumed [*-1]by the competing interests of bureaucrats, politicians and unions.
example.arg: by the competing interests of bureaucrats, politicians and unions
